name: Crypto Commute
description: A final year engineering project, It is a decentralized blockchain cab-booking platform that allows users to book cabs online. Built on web3 technologies like Alchemy, hardhat, web3.js on the ethereum platform.

name: Fintech Leonidas
description: A banking web app built with Next.js utilizing SSR and dynamic rendering for scalability along with Appwrite & Plaid API. The app provides a secure platform for real-time financial insights and transactions.

name: Brainwave
description: For a hands-on learning experience in Tailwind CSS and mobile responsiveness, I built this mini project - Learnt from the popular YouTube channel JSM.

name: DevQuery
description: This is a stack overflow like website built with MERN stack. It is a full-stack project with authentication, authorization, and CRUD operations. It is a responsive website with a dark theme aesthetic.

name: Pseudo Nike Website
description: A Nike landing page clone built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring minimalist design and responsive layouts. It highlights skills in layout replication and styling for a smooth user experience.

name: GPT-3 Webpage
description: A fully responsive landing page built with React.js, showcasing UI/UX design principles. As one of my first React-based projects, it highlights component-based architecture & styling technique.
